decision_conditions: In the absence of an Arboricultural Impact Assessment, a comprehensive site specific Method of Demolition that considers routing to and from site and provides details of trip generation, this application has failed to meet Condition (b) (i) of Schedule 2 of the Town and Country Planning General (Permitted Development) (England) Order) 2015 (as amended) and prior approval is required and refused as it is contrary to Policies AM7, BE38, OE1 and OE3 of the Local Plan: Part Two (November 2012) and Policies DMHB 11, DMHB 14 and DMT 2 of the emerging Local Plan: Part Two (March 2019).

The proposed 2m fence around the perimeter following the demolition of a locally listed building fails to provide appropriate site restoration and it would result in a blight to the streetscene along this part of The Drive contrary to Policies DMHB 3 and DMHB 12 of the Hillingdon Revised Proposed Submission Version of the Local Plan: Part Two - Development Management Policies (2019).
description: Demolition of existing property including site clearance and landscaping and the erection of a 2m perimeter fence with gated access (Prior Approval Application under Schedule 2, Part 11, Class B of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) Order 2015 (as amended)
